about_the_game:
In this first-person shooter (FPS) adventure set in the wake of a devastating meteor shower, players are thrust into the heart of a desperate struggle for survival against hordes of undead monstrosities. As they navigate the desolate landscapes left in the wake of the meteor storm, players must utilize their keen aim and quick reflexes to fend off relentless waves of zombies and mutated creatures.

Armed with an arsenal of powerful firearms, explosives, and melee weapons, players must scavenge for ammunition and supplies while holding off the relentless onslaught of the infected. Every shot counts as players aim to conserve precious resources and eliminate threats efficiently.

The FPS perspective immerses players in the heart-pounding action, allowing them to feel the intensity of the battles as they fight for their lives against overwhelming odds. Whether facing off against swarms of undead in open fields or defending fortified positions against waves of attackers, players must stay vigilant and adapt their strategies to survive.

As they progress through the game, players uncover clues and unravel the mystery behind the meteor shower and the sinister virus it unleashed. With each wave survived, players inch closer to uncovering the truth while facing increasingly challenging enemies and environments.

With its immersive FPS gameplay, intense action, this wave-based zombie survival game delivers an adrenaline-fueled experience that will keep players on the edge of their seats as they fight to survive in a world overrun by the undead.

content_descriptors.notes: this game contain cartoon blood and demon and the story is related to satan.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: intel i5 8400 or Ryzen 2600/x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 750 ti or amd R7 260
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1660 or Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
